admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: Compulsory pension and unemployment insurance,Capital markets,General industry and trade sector,Banking,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Loan Project
            will facilitate a more rapid and effective restructuring of
            the enterprise sector -- crucial to both macroeconomic
            stabilization and recovery in output. The program supported
            by this loan focuses on steps to eliminate constraints that
            have been preventing such restructuring. Major measures are:
            liberalizing exports, dismantling monopoly holdings,
            facilitating entry of firms through land reform and exit of
            firms through foreclosure and bankruptcy, accelerating
            privatization, imposing financial discipline with isolation
            for 20 large distressed enterprises, and strengthening
            unemployment benefit policy to facilitate labor adjustment.
